name: Fire Degree
description:
Synopsis:

Enter Ri and Dave, two custodians of a space station designed to prepare the cultivation, habitation of the planet, and paving the way for the human colonizers. Ri has supressed her memories before the singularity and that which drove her and her husband to join the space development project, transfering their minds into machines, and traveling far into space. She has been asleep for many months and has been having a recurring dream about the past while Dave is monitoring her and running the station. Ultimately, all is not well with the base.

A crisis is at hand, what or who lies behind all of this? 

It is up Ri to find out, face her past, and her fear of that which happened.

Development Background:

4 Game Designers worked on this 7 week game design degree project at Futuregames in Stockholm between Nov. 2021 - Jan. 2022.

Team:

Lead Game Designer and Narrative Designer: 

Pussel Widegren 

Technical Designer: 

Cedric Fredmer 

Level Designer: 

Fabian Adlertz Bertzén 

Technical Designer, Sound Designer/Music Composer,

3D Art/VFX Cinematics, and Principal Baby Bot Maker: 

Robert Bünsow AKA Max Robert (That's me :P)
